script:
-- PLAYER SPAM GUI (LOCAL SCRIPT - SAFE)
-- dm community (educacional)

local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local player = Players.LocalPlayer

--================ GUI =================--

local gui = Instance.new("ScreenGui")
gui.Name = "PlayerSpamGUI"
gui.ResetOnSpawn = false
gui.Parent = player:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")

local frame = Instance.new("Frame", gui)
frame.Size = UDim2.fromScale(0.32, 0.45)
frame.Position = UDim2.fromScale(0.34, 0.28)
frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(15,15,15)
frame.BorderSizePixel = 0
frame.Active = true
frame.Draggable = true
Instance.new("UICorner", frame).CornerRadius = UDim.new(0,14)

local title = Instance.new("TextLabel", frame)
title.Size = UDim2.fromScale(1, 0.12)
title.BackgroundTransparency = 1
title.Text = "DM PLAYER LIST"
title.Font = Enum.Font.GothamBold
title.TextScaled = true
title.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1,1,1)

--================ SCROLL =================--

local scroll = Instance.new("ScrollingFrame", frame)
scroll.Position = UDim2.fromScale(0.03, 0.14)
scroll.Size = UDim2.fromScale(0.94, 0.83)
scroll.CanvasSize = UDim2.new(0,0,0,0)
scroll.ScrollBarImageTransparency = 0.3
scroll.BackgroundTransparency = 1
scroll.BorderSizePixel = 0

local layout = Instance.new("UIListLayout", scroll)
layout.Padding = UDim.new(0,6)

--================ FUNÇÃO =================--

local function fakeSpam(target)
	print("[SPAM LOCAL] Ação simulada em:", target.Name)

	-- efeito visual LOCAL (exemplo)
	if target.Character and target.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then
		local hl = Instance.new("Highlight")
		hl.FillColor = Color3.fromRGB(170,0,255)
		hl.OutlineColor = Color3.new(0,0,0)
		hl.Parent = target.Character

		task.delay(0.5, function()
			if hl then hl:Destroy() end
		end)
	end
end

local function addPlayer(plr)
	if plr == player then return end

	local item = Instance.new("Frame")
	item.Size = UDim2.fromScale(1, 0.13)
	item.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(25,25,25)
	item.BorderSizePixel = 0
	item.Parent = scroll
	Instance.new("UICorner", item).CornerRadius = UDim.new(0,10)

	local name = Instance.new("TextLabel", item)
	name.Position = UDim2.fromScale(0.04, 0.15)
	name.Size = UDim2.fromScale(0.55, 0.7)
	name.BackgroundTransparency = 1
	name.Text = plr.Name
	name.TextScaled = true
	name.Font = Enum.Font.Gotham
	name.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1,1,1)
	name.TextXAlignment = Left

	local btn = Instance.new("TextButton", item)
	btn.Position = UDim2.fromScale(0.62, 0.18)
	btn.Size = UDim2.fromScale(0.33, 0.64)
	btn.Text = "SPAM"
	btn.TextScaled = true
	btn.Font = Enum.Font.GothamBold
	btn.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1,1,1)
	btn.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(120,0,160)
	btn.BorderSizePixel = 0
	Instance.new("UICorner", btn).CornerRadius = UDim.new(0,8)

	btn.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function()
		fakeSpam(plr)
	end)

	scroll.CanvasSize = UDim2.new(0,0,0,layout.AbsoluteContentSize.Y + 10)
end

--================ LOAD =================--

for _,plr in ipairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
	addPlayer(plr)
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(addPlayer)

Players.PlayerRemoving:Connect(function(plr)
	for _,v in ipairs(scroll:GetChildren()) do
		if v:IsA("Frame") then
			local label = v:FindFirstChildOfClass("TextLabel")
			if label and label.Text == plr.Name then
				v:Destroy()
			end
		end
	end
	scroll.CanvasSize = UDim2.new(0,0,0,layout.AbsoluteContentSize.Y + 10)
end)
